page.title: 03SOCIAL CONCERNS CONTINUED
page.content: {Residents}are concerned about the amount of{litter}and{graffiti}that is spoiling the surrounding countryside and public buildings. They are unhappy too about horses and dogs that foul pavements and parks. They fear that disease may spread if it is not stopped. The{Parish Council}in Alderley Edge has recently joined{"The {League for the Introduction of Canine {Control"}to stamp out the problem . In the district there is an alarming increase in house{burglary.}There are more burglaries than any other crimes. Increasingly local police are being asked to survey properties to help make them more burglar proof. Our interviews with local people indicate that in this area there is a very caring society.
